Gatekeeper Ziggurat:
Give me a scroll of ancient magic and make a step back ...
... light cleaning. He applied to the darkness, and all is dark. The fire of the soul ... burns the darkness ...
Done. The spell lifted. Here you go Blank Scroll , as I promised you.
This will help you clean the scroll when you will communicate with the Merchant of Mammon , which appears from time to time in the sacred area.
If you want to build more of Clean scrolls, go to the sacred area, kill guardians of ancient cult and bring me scrolls of ancient magic .
